summary: A police Lieutenant uncovers more than he bargained for as his investigation of a series of murders, which have all the hallmarks of the deceased Gemini serial killer, leads him to question the patients of a psychiatric ward.
cast: George C. Scott|Ed Flanders|Brad Dourif|Jason Miller|Nicol Williamson|Scott Wilson|Nancy Fish|George DiCenzo|Don Gordon|Lee Richardson|Grand L. title: El exorcista III
